column4: Question basics of Ubuntu, I accidently deleted my bottom pannel, and lost the button on the button right/left that opens/closes windows to see Desktop.
Question basics of Ubuntu, I accidently deleted my bottom pannel, and lost the button on the button right/left that opens/closes windows to see Desktop. How do I get it back.
right-click on the panel and select "Add to Panel"
you deleted the panel right? and now you have made a new panel
